name: string::String::into_boxed_str

string::String: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 1639, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 2824, name: "vec::Vec" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 93, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U8)) }), Type(Ty { id: 17, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 2583, name: "alloc::Global" }), GenericArgs([]))) })]))) })])

doc: Converts this `String` into a [Box]<[str]>. Before doing the conversion, this method discards excess capacity like [`shrink_to_fit`]. Note that this call may reallocate and copy the bytes of the string. [`shrink_to_fit`]: String::shrink_to_fit [str]: prim@str "str" # Examples ``` let s = String::from("hello"); let b = s.into_boxed_str(); ```
